column4: Hey, what happens if I just uninstall grub-pc from Ubuntu when I have Ubu 10.10 and Win 7 installed at same hdd?
probably u wont be able to boot into both os
I mean win 7 boot will keep existing. The question is how to boot into Ubuntu without grub-pc app?
u have to install grub into the partition u installed ubuntu and make it a chain loader in windows boot loader am not sure abt it
